attributes.action: Act on the recommendation of the Director General, British Chamber of Commerce, calling for the re-introduction of grammar schools, to combat the poor standards of education of school leavers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Director General has quoted figures which indicate that, in the future, foreign workers will be far better qualified both academically, technically, with a superior work ethic than local labour.This is not an "anti-foreigner" comment- much more a "pro-local" youngsters plea.
